climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: This Certified Refurbished product is tested & certified by Garmin to look and work like-new. The product includes all original accessories, and is backed by a one year warranty.
body.description: The Garmin REFURBISHED Nuvi 42LM 4.3 In. GPS Navigator with U.S. Coverage and Lifetime Maps offers dependable, easy-to-use guidance with its bright 4.3-inch display, spoken turn-by-turn directions and many innovative features. Maps of the lower 49 states, plus free lifetime map updates, let you easily find addresses and millions of points of interest. Lane assist with junction view indicates the proper lane for a turn or exit with brightly colored arrows and detailed pictures. The Refurbished Nuvi 42 also displays speed limit and accurate arrival time. Plus Garmin Express makes it easy to update maps and software, transfer favorites to and from devices, and install free custom vehicles and voices. Package Content: refurbished nuvi 42preloaded with City Navigator NT North America - lower 49 stateslifetime mapsvehicle power cablevehicle suction cup mountquick start manualwarranty Lane assist guides to proper lane for navigation Junction view displays junction signs Route avoidance for avoiding highways, tolls, etc. Speed limit indicator displays speed limit for most major roads in the U.S. and Europe Where am I finds closest hospitals, police and gas stations, nearest address and intersection Height 3.10 Width 4.90 Depth 0.80 Weight 0.33 Color Operating System Batteries Included Batteries Required Number of Batteries 1 Battery Type Rechargeable Lithium-ion (included) Language English Assembly Required

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like how you can unplug it and use it from ...
reviews.reviewText: How did we manage without these traveling gems? Even a seasoned Seattle resident used this Garmin GPS unit to navigate downtown traffic. I like how you can unplug it and use it from the back seat or take it with you for a walk in a strange city. I bought a refurbished one and it works like a charm. Definitely worth the investment if you travel unfamiliar routes even if only once in awhile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good unit for the price.
reviews.reviewText: For the price, it works well. Has trouble on long trips (Like Florida to New York), and you have to probably put each days destination in. Wish auto GPS units allowed for multiple waypoints on a trip like marine units.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Love It!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as my older one had no map updates.My daughter and I were going on a road trip so this was the first test of the product and I wasn't disappointed. I love the features; in particular as you are approaching a street that street name appears on the screen which is excellent for going someplace new for the first time. The other feature I love is as you are approaching exits on a freeway, the screen splits in two; 1) it shows where you are currently traveling and 2) the number/name of the exit. I like the smaller size of the unit too. My old one was 5 inches across and this is only 4 inches. Thanks Garmin I love this product!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not as advertised.
reviews.reviewText: The product was listed as in excellent condition. The screen had a 2-inch gouge mark across the screen. The device had obvious heavy wear marks on the case. The touch screen was worn to the point that you had to search to find an area to touch on the screen and then tap it several times before it would except the command. Very disappointed with the purchase, but I needed to keep the unit due that I needed it for a trip. I am not happy it the device after receiving it in such worn condition after it was listed in EXCELLENT condition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2016
reviews.reviewText: works great , Samantha's voice is very clear, if wrong turn, GPS makes adjustments quicklygreat for Seeing street names & locations in the dark.shopped around for pricing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2015
reviews.reviewText: quick shipping, quality product and easy set up made this purchase a WISE SALE.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best GPS Ever!! :)
reviews.reviewText: I love it doesn't even cover it!!! This is the 2nd Garmin GPS I have owned and I loved the first one buttttt let me tell you...this one is just totally amazing!! It is much wider than the first one I had and now that I am in my mid 40's it is certainly helpful..lol. I just love how the screen divides when you get to an exit and it shows you and tells you exactly what exit to take!! My husband & I were just floored the first time we used it and it did that!! :)I will recommend this to anyone!! Thanks again for such a wonderful product!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2015
reviews.reviewText: This thing SUCKS. It does not know a lot of the roads in San Diego that have been around forever. Slow and glitchy. My old one would give you a list of roads as you spelled so if you did not know how to spell it all you had to do was get close and it would be on the list. Not this POS. if it's not spelled perfect it tells you not found. Use Siri on my phone more than this piece of junk. Do not buy this thing you will be as pissed as me if you do.
